title: Greenville woman's death ruled a homicide
content:
The death of Tiffany Yvette Ford, who authorities said was found deceased at her Greenville home Sunday, has been ruled as a homicide.
Coroner Parks Evans said an autopsy Monday determined Ford, 20, died of a gunshot wound.
Deputies said they responded to a shooting incident at about 2:30 a.m. Sunday at Ford's home on Echols Drive.
Several people were inside the home off Old Augusta Road at the time, but no suspects have been identified, said Sheriff's Office spokesman Drew Pinciaro.
